name: Vendoo
headline: We help online sellers manage a sales business on multiple platforms.
description:
Vendoo is a software that was created to solve the daily pain points of the millions of sellers in the steadily growing reselling industry. Our goal is to save sellers time and help them make more money. The user friendly interface allows sellers to crosspost their items onto multiple marketplaces in a fraction of the time that it takes to do so manually. Users can currently list items onto 10 marketplaces, including eBay, Poshmark, Etsy, Mercari, Facebook Marketplace and more.

The software also provides other conveniences for sellers, like the ability to easily import their existing listings, delisting and relisting items with one click, and inventory management features like easy sorting and searching. Vendoo also provides sellers with business data and analytics to help them make calculated decisions to grow their business.

founders.name: Thomas Rivas, Founder
founders.description: Online seller since 2008, who came up with the idea for Vendoo based on his personal need to be able to crosspost. Has a double major from the University of Maryland and also some development experience.

founders.name: Chris Amador, Founder
founders.description: Fifteen years of experience in building websites, brands, and products. I am currently building the best reseller tool at Vendoo, Inc.

founders.name: Josh Dzime-Assison, Founder
founders.description: Josh Dzime-Assison is our CMO and has been a full-time reseller for over 15 years. In addition to being a reselling subject matter expert, Josh opened a sneaker store at age 20 and has worked as an Image Consultant for numerous musicians and professional athletes. He is currently leading the Marketing team at Vendoo.

founders.name: Ben Martinez, Founder
founders.description: Graduated from UMD, strong salesman/businessman and currently leading the Customer Support team in Vendoo.

## FAQs
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### What Are Crosslisting Platforms?
Crosslisting platforms are tools that allow resellers like you to post their products on multiple online marketplaces. This software makes managing inventory, creating listings, and tracking sales across various platforms easy, saving you time and manual effort. ‍By centralizing these tasks, resellers can reach a broader audience and manage their business operations from a single, unified interface.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### How Do Crosslisting Platforms Benefit Resellers?
Crosslisting platforms benefit resellers by greatly reducing their time and effort in managing listings across multiple marketplaces. They streamline inventory management, prevent duplicate sales through automated delisting, and provide powerful analytics to monitor sales performance. These tools offer 360-degree visibility, expand reach, and ultimately boost sales, allowing resellers to focus on other important aspects of their business, such as sourcing products and engaging with customers.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### Which Marketplaces Are Supported by Your Cross Platform Listing Tool?
Vendoo supports many popular marketplaces, such as eBay, Poshmark, Facebook Marketplace, Mercari, Etsy, Depop, Shopify, Whatnot, Kidizen, Grailed, and Vestiaire Collective. This extensive integration helps resellers effortlessly reach different audiences and maximize their sales potential by managing all their listings from a centralized platform.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### How Can Crosslisting Platforms Improve Sales Performance?
Crosslisting platforms improve sales performance by increasing the visibility of your products across multiple marketplaces without your intervention. They help you manage your inventory more effectively by keeping your listings current and appealing to customers. Features like automatic sales detection and delisting prevent errors and ensure accurate inventory levels. Moreover, detailed analytics help you track sales trends and make informed decisions to improve your business performance and increase sales.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### How Do I Choose the Right Crosslisting Platform for My Business Size and Type?
When choosing a crosslisting platform, you must consider your business size, type, and specific needs. Look for a platform that supports your marketplaces, offers flexible pricing plans, and includes features like automated delisting, bulk actions, and detailed analytics. Read user reviews and take advantage of free trials to see if the platform is easy to use and effective. Lastly, ensure the platform can scale with your business growth and offers excellent customer support to assist with any problems you may encounter. As a leading crosslisting platform, Vendoo checks all the boxes and has become a sought-after option for modern businesses.

## List Once, Sell Everywhere: Effortless Multichannel Management
With just a few clicks, import, create listings, and crosslist your inventory across 10+ marketplaces.With our multi-quantity manager, you can organize and crosspost single and multi-quantity items in just a few simple steps.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f622c6681d34140afb9d542/66d0c39bf3e6de6a4d793b26_66b64e41f5c7bea70c88d43e_Simple-Multichannel-Inventory-Management.webp)

## Refresh Stale Listings With the Bulk Delist & Relist Feature
Delist and relist hundreds of items at once across marketplaces. Keep your inventory fresh to boost exposure and make more sales. Did you know Vendoo users who regularly Delist & Relist their stale inventory make 33% more sales?

## FAQs
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### What Are Crosslisting Platforms?
Crosslisting platforms are tools that allow resellers like you to post their products on multiple online marketplaces. This software makes managing inventory, creating listings, and tracking sales across various platforms easy, saving you time and manual effort. ‍By centralizing these tasks, resellers can reach a broader audience and manage their business operations from a single, unified interface.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### How Do Crosslisting Platforms Benefit Resellers?
Crosslisting platforms benefit resellers by greatly reducing their time and effort in managing listings across multiple marketplaces. They streamline inventory management, prevent duplicate sales through automated delisting, and provide powerful analytics to monitor sales performance. These tools offer 360-degree visibility, expand reach, and ultimately boost sales, allowing resellers to focus on other important aspects of their business, such as sourcing products and engaging with customers.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### Which Marketplaces Are Supported by Your Cross Platform Listing Tool?
Vendoo supports many popular marketplaces, such as eBay, Poshmark, Facebook Marketplace, Mercari, Etsy, Depop, Shopify, Whatnot, Kidizen, Grailed, and Vestiaire Collective. This extensive integration helps resellers effortlessly reach different audiences and maximize their sales potential by managing all their listings from a centralized platform.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### How Can Crosslisting Platforms Improve Sales Performance?
Crosslisting platforms improve sales performance by increasing the visibility of your products across multiple marketplaces without your intervention. They help you manage your inventory more effectively by keeping your listings current and appealing to customers. Features like automatic sales detection and delisting prevent errors and ensure accurate inventory levels. Moreover, detailed analytics help you track sales trends and make informed decisions to improve your business performance and increase sales.
[](https://vendoo.co/<#>)
### How Do I Choose the Right Crosslisting Platform for My Business Size and Type?
When choosing a crosslisting platform, you must consider your business size, type, and specific needs. Look for a platform that supports your marketplaces, offers flexible pricing plans, and includes features like automated delisting, bulk actions, and detailed analytics. Read user reviews and take advantage of free trials to see if the platform is easy to use and effective. Lastly, ensure the platform can scale with your business growth and offers excellent customer support to assist with any problems you may encounter. As a leading crosslisting platform, Vendoo checks all the boxes and has become a sought-after option for modern businesses.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Vendoo**

Founded in 2017 and located in Washington, DC, Vendoo is a software company that serves the booming reselling industry. The company emerged from the 2022 Y Combinator batch, emphasizing its innovative approach to solving common pain points faced by sellers operating across various online marketplaces. With a dedicated team of 55 employees, Vendoo's mission is clear: to help online sellers manage their businesses more effectively and efficiently across multiple platforms.

**What Does Vendoo Do?**

At its core, Vendoo provides an easy-to-use platform that allows sellers to crosspost their products to over ten different online marketplaces, including eBay, Poshmark, Etsy, Mercari, and Facebook Marketplace. The software is designed to save time and increase profitability by simplifying the listing process, which can be tedious and time-consuming when done manually.

**Key Features:**

1. **Crosslisting**: Users can list their items on multiple marketplaces with just a few clicks, making the selling process faster and easier.
  
2. **Inventory Management**: Vendoo offers robust inventory management tools, allowing sellers to organize, sort, and search their listings effortlessly.
  
3. **Analytics and Business Insights**: The software provides sellers with valuable data and analytics to help them understand their sales patterns and make informed decisions for growth.
  
4. **Sales Detection and Auto Delist**: This feature automatically removes sold items from all active listings across marketplaces, preventing double-selling and enhancing accuracy.
  
5. **Mobile App**: Vendoo boasts the only crosslisting mobile app, enabling sellers to manage their inventory on the go.

**Why Choose Vendoo?**

Vendoo stands out due to its user-friendly interface and comprehensive features tailored for resellers. Sellers using Vendoo report significant improvements in their productivity and sales, often seeing a sell-through rate that is 180% higher when listing on three or more platforms. With a user base exceeding 40,000, Vendoo’s impact on individual seller success is notable.

In summary, if you're in the reselling game and looking to streamline your operations, Vendoo positions itself as a reliable partner ready to help you elevate your selling experience. You can check them out at [Vendoo.co](https://vendoo.co).
